mapper.select: SELECT id id, account account, password password, salt salt, name name FROM tb_manager WHERE account = #{employeeCode}

SELECT DISTINCT c.url url, c.code code, c.name name, c.icon icon FROM tb_manager_role a left JOIN tb_role_menu b on a.role_id = b.role_num left JOIN tb_menu c ON c.code = b.menu_code WHERE c.is_menu = 2 AND a.manager_id = #{managerId} AND c.url != '#' order by c.seq

SELECT b.POSITION_CODE positionCode, b.POSITION_ID positionId, b.POSITION_NAME positionName FROM TB_TASK a LEFT JOIN TB_AREA_POSITION b ON a.POSITION_CODE = B.POSITION_CODE WHERE CHARINDEX(a.EMPLOYEE_CODE,#{employeeCode})>0

SELECT USER_NAME employeeName, CASE WHEN GENDER = 'MALE' THEN '男' WHEN GENDER = 'FEMALE' THEN '女' END gender, DATE_FORMAT(BIRTH,'%Y-%m-%d') birth, HEAD_IMG_URL url FROM tb_user_info WHERE WORK_NO = #{employeeCode}

SELECT a.id id, a.name employeeName, a.account employeeCode FROM tb_manager a left join tb_manager_org b on a.id = b.manager_id left join tb_org c on b.org_id = c.id WHERE 1=1
AND c.code = #{orgCode}

SELECT a.id id, a.name employeeName, a.account employeeCode FROM tb_manager a left join tb_manager_role b on a.id = b.manager_id WHERE 1=1
AND b.role_id = #{roleNum}
